name: WayDown (itch)
description:
After a traumatic battle, you've been cursed to walk the earth unable to truly die, you're thrust into battle after battle, dying  over and over unable to rest. Until you find the last Nazi bunker, Bunker 666. You know immediately what to do, you've gotta get to the bottom, and get your soul back.

WayDown is a quick paced Roguelite-shooter in which you, the player, must brave Nazi bunkers, dank dungeons, spooky ruins and more in a bid to retrieve your soul from Satan himself. Along the way, build a team of rescued soldiers and technicians to help keep you alive and defeat the forces of evil.

--FEATURES--

--40+ Weapons: Thompson, Enfield, Trenchgun, the list goes on

--5 Strange Environments: Bunker, Mines and more

--30+ Enemies and Minibosses: Nazis and Skeletons and BullyWug, Oh my.

--Build a squad: Rescue captured soldiers to build your Squad, use their special abilities to decimate the depths-

-DRM Free: Give it to your friends, or enemies!-

WayDown was developed jointly by CakeNeq  Games and Dinobyte Softworks.
